body:
**Is this a request for help?**: No

**What keywords did you search in Kubernetes issues before filing this one?** : juju cluster apiserver

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?** (choose one): BUG REPORT

**Kubernetes version** (use `kubectl version`): v1.3.4

**Environment**:
- **Cloud provider or hardware configuration**: Amazon
- **OS** (e.g. from /etc/os-release): Ubuntu 16.04 xenial
- **Kernel** (e.g. `uname -a`): `Linux ip-172-31-21-245 4.4.0-34-generic #53-Ubuntu SMP Wed Jul 27 16:06:39 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux`
- **Install tools**: Using the Juju software.
- **Others**:

**What happened**: The kubernetes apiserver does not start. I used docker logs to get the log messages from the apiserver container:

```
# docker logs 31eb7a4f2ba2
I0830 17:04:16.919055       1 interface.go:248] Default route transits interface "eth0"
I0830 17:04:16.919524       1 interface.go:93] Interface eth0 is up
I0830 17:04:16.919703       1 interface.go:138] Interface "eth0" has 2 addresses :[172.31.21.245/20 fe80::8b:90ff:fec0:6aa1/64].
I0830 17:04:16.919822       1 interface.go:105] Checking addr  172.31.21.245/20.
I0830 17:04:16.919884       1 interface.go:114] IP found 172.31.21.245
I0830 17:04:16.919974       1 interface.go:144] valid IPv4 address for interface "eth0" found as 172.31.21.245.
I0830 17:04:16.920035       1 interface.go:254] Choosing IP 172.31.21.245 
I0830 17:04:16.920122       1 genericapiserver.go:606] Will report 172.31.21.245 as public IP address.
I0830 17:04:16.922488       1 reflector.go:202] Starting reflector *api.Namespace (5m0s) from k8s.io/kubernetes/plugin/pkg/admission/namespace/lifecycle/admission.go:116
I0830 17:04:16.922612       1 reflector.go:202] Starting reflector *api.LimitRange (0) from k8s.io/kubernetes/plugin/pkg/admission/limitranger/admission.go:154
I0830 17:04:16.922819       1 reflector.go:213] Starting reflector *api.ServiceAccount (0) from k8s.io/kubernetes/plugin/pkg/admission/serviceaccount/admission.go:103
I0830 17:04:16.922929       1 reflector.go:213] Starting reflector *api.Secret (0) from k8s.io/kubernetes/plugin/pkg/admission/serviceaccount/admission.go:119
F0830 17:04:16.922997       1 plugins.go:143] Unknown admission plugin: DefaultStorageClass
```

**What you expected to happen**: I expected the apiserver to start.

**How to reproduce it** (as minimally and precisely as possible): This error came out of our automated build process it is not easy to reproduce.

**Anything else do we need to know**: I did some root cause analysis and found the cause of the problem and will propose a fix if I can verify the fix with our testing services.

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG API Machinery.
labels.name: sig/api-machinery

title: The juju cluster provider does not start the apiserver.
